Connect with your graduate friends

GradConnect is a platform that connects grad students with their peers to enhance relationships within the community

GradConnect was develop by two Georgetown MBA students to help their friends connect more with the community

Students

Help your students connect within their campus group, activites, and social network

Alumni

Help your alumni stay connect with up-to-date events regarding the university, news, or even networking

Other schools

GradConnect gives the versatility to connect among other grad programs inside the university

Other universities

Led your alumni connection reach beyond your university. Enjoy the benefits of connecting with people from the same area

Enrich the connection with your grad friends

Grad connect is a way of life. Stay in touch with your friends while you participate in several social events with them

Stop waiting.
Start connecting.
